title: Learn Holiday Japanese
purpose: I will be going on holiday to Japan for 7 days I would like to learn common Japanese phrases that can help me communicate effectively with the locals.

title: Mt Fuji Expedition
purpose: I am traveling to Japan on holiday for 5 days. I will be engaging in outdoor activities such as climbing Mt Fuji, bouldering etc. I would like to learn some common Japanese phrases that can help be on trip, especially phrases related mountain climbing, bouldering, food and transportation.
